name: Your Home
description: This game originally participate on Global Game Jam 2019! This is a story of the man, which return home from the hard work, just to find out what his home, become a deadly trap. And to get out, you need to play some game with a bloody maniac.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Celeron 2000 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 aviable card Storage: 512 MB available space
